alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 6:19PM CDT until June 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Greene County in eastern Arkansas... Northwestern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Southern Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 619 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cardwell, or 8 miles southwest of Senath, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Gosnell, Senath, Cardwell, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Happy Corners, Calumet, Buckeye, Mounds, Arkmo, Woodland Corner, Pawheen, Brighton, Bertig, Garson, Stark City, Boynton, Rives, Hornersville Junction and Paulding. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
